meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels clearly show 02271.8. The red needle is positioned exactly halfway between the 0.03 and 0.04 marks on the circular dial, indicating 0.035 m³. The angle is calculated by estimating the 0.03 mark at ~105 degrees and 0.04 mark at ~135 degrees (from 12 o'clock clockwise), then interpolating for 0.035.
